sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message:
Advanced â€” Include PHP partial from the current theme using locate_template() from the /page-builder/partials/ folder. Will require custom development work. Useful for one time items, new objects. Vetted items should be converted to a reusable item (e.g. includable post object, or new ACF row item).

If a card size is selected, the post will be place within a grid card, otherwise it will be full width.

sub_fields.label: File Name
sub_fields.name: filename
sub_fields.instructions: File name only, the path will be prepended.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Advanced: Include a page or post object within this section. Will pull in the associated post or page template within the row.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Advanced: Include a page or post object within this section. Will pull in the associated post or page template within the row.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Breadcrumbs will appear based on page hierarchy. There are no styling options.

sub_fields.label: Use Page Title
sub_fields.name: use_page_title
sub_fields.message: Fill the text field with the page/post title

sub_fields.label: Screen Reader Only
sub_fields.name: screen_reader_only
sub_fields.message: Heading will be hidden visually, but available for screen readers and the HTML outline

sub_fields.label: Column Size
sub_fields.name: column_size
sub_fields.instructions: 0 will inherit column size from the previous breakpoint.

sub_fields.label: Billboard Image Area Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: Pixel height value for billboard. Default 600px.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Add CSS that will be scoped to this section's ID
